Transform Your Kitchen with Cabinet Refinishing

Expertly refinished cabinets for kitchens, bathrooms, and beyond

Scroll

Give your kitchen a brand-new look with our professional cabinet refinishing services. Serving Chester, Delaware, and Montgomery counties, and the Main Line, we provide flawless results that enhance your home's value without the expense and inconvenience of a complete remodel.

Why Choose Maco Painting for Cabinet Refinishing?

  • Expert Craftsmanship: Our team specializes in meticulous surface preparation and application techniques, delivering a flawless finish that enhances your kitchen's beauty and durability.
  • Cost-Effective Transformation: Refinishing your cabinets offers a budget-friendly solution to update your kitchen's appearance without the expense and inconvenience of a complete remodel.
  • Cutting-Edge Technology — Festool Dustless Sanding System: Our use of the Festool Dustless Sander minimizes airborne dust during surface preparation, ensuring cleaner air and a healthier home environment. This advanced system also guarantees a smoother surface, leading to superior paint and stain adhesion for a long-lasting finish.

Our Cabinet Refinishing Process

Consultation & Color Selection

We discuss your vision and provide expert advice on color choices, including trending hues like deep greens, navy blues, and rich earth tones, to achieve the desired aesthetic.

Surface Preparation

We meticulously clean all cabinet surfaces to remove grease and grime, ensuring optimal paint adhesion. Our team utilizes the Festool Dustless Sander to smooth surfaces, reduce imperfections, and eliminate airborne dust for a cleaner environment.

Priming & Painting/Staining

We apply premium primers to enhance paint durability and provide a solid foundation for the topcoat. Utilizing top-tier paints and stains, we apply the chosen color or finish, ensuring even coverage and a professional appearance.

Protective Coating & Reassembly

A protective topcoat is applied to safeguard against daily wear and tear, extending the lifespan of your cabinets. We carefully reattach hardware and ensure every detail is perfected before completing the project, followed by a thorough cleanup that leaves your kitchen pristine and ready for enjoyment.

Current Trends in Cabinet Refinishing

Natural Wood Finishes

The beauty of natural wood is making a comeback, with homeowners opting for finishes that showcase the wood's grain and texture, adding warmth and authenticity to kitchen spaces.

Bold Color Choices

Vibrant colors such as deep greens, rich navy blues, and earthy tones are gaining popularity, allowing homeowners to make a statement and infuse personality into their kitchens.

Matte and Textured Finishes

Matte finishes and subtle textures are preferred for their modern look and ease of maintenance, providing a sophisticated and practical solution for busy kitchens.

Ready to Upgrade Your Kitchen Cabinets?

Transform your kitchen with expert craftsmanship and personalized service.
